name: Gravity Force (itch) (CoolCat7) (CoolCat7) (CoolCat7)
description:
Test your movement accuracy in a simple game called "Gravity Force"! By controlling the player, avoid spikes and enemies! If you want to create your own challenge, use the level editor (in development)!

Features:

  • 10 really hard levels!
  • Music!
  • Level editor!
  • Weekly level!
  • Unlocked achievements!
  • Collect stars and orbs to unlock other levels!

The game in active development...
